title: Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Bagatelle," Front Side", 1992
medium: Black and color marking pens; yellow, white crayon, graphite on three sheets of white tracing paper
dimensions: 31.9 x 48.9 cm (12 9/16 x 19 1/4 in. ), at widest point
description: Five panel screen of differently colored and shaped panels with cut outs.  From left to right:  light blue panel with circular cut out in middle and tall thin triangular yellow and white striped section at left edge; black and gray panel with saw tooth painted motif and saw tooth cut out along right edge; red panel with seven thin horizontal slits at right edge; panel painted with tall thin red and blue triangles (at left) and tall thin blue and white triangles over painted with thin black stripes (at right).

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Screen Design:  "Bagatelle," Front Side", 1992.
1992. Black and color marking pens; yellow, white crayon, graphite on three sheets of white tracing paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-76.
